response.overview: Join Chris, Diana, and Alex as they try to make a difference in the lives of the people around them. From bullies and grumpy neighbors to puppies at the animal shelter, the Jesus Kids Club is there to help, sharing God s love and keeping Jesus at the center of their lives. Episode 1: The Best Reward Chris learns that helping others can be the best reward of all! Episode 2: Zombie Cat Alex learns that God s plan for him isn't always what he expects. Episode 3: Prayer for One God uses Diana as a blessing for one special person. Episode 4: Bad Gum Chris, Diana, and Alex show the neighborhood bully who Jesus is. Episode 5: Remy s Carnival Alex gives something special to brighten the day of a little boy. Episode 6: Checkmate Chris's persistence pays off while trying to help Mr. Buckle.
response.title: The Jesus Kids' Club
